org.apache.flex.compiler.css

Interface ICSSNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISourceLocation
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICSSDocument, ICSSFontFace, ICSSMediaQueryCondition, ICSSNamespaceDefinition, ICSSProperty, ICSSPropertyValue, ICSSRule, ICSSSelector, ICSSSelectorCondition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSSArrayPropertyValue, CSSColorPropertyValue, CSSCombinator, CSSDocument, CSSFontFace, CSSFunctionCallPropertyValue, CSSKeyFrames, CSSKeywordPropertyValue, CSSMediaQueryCondition, CSSNamespaceDefinition, CSSNumberPropertyValue, CSSProperty, CSSPropertyValue, CSSRgbaColorPropertyValue, CSSRgbColorPropertyValue, CSSRule, CSSSelector, CSSSelectorCondition, CSSStringPropertyValue, CSSTextNode, CSSTypedNode, CSSURLAndFormatPropertyValue

    public interface ICSSNode
extends ISourceLocation
    All CSS DOM node classes implement this interface to adapt to JBurg's DefaultInodeAdapter.
